reviewText: I really wish you would make this on DvD! I loved this mini series.  It was so great and I have looked for it everywhere and can't find it. :(
Love this movie why can't we get it on did?????
This was gift to a friend. Did not hear anything negative.

PLEASE, PLEASE make this Movie on DVD or BluRay !!!!
I just LOVE this TV Mini Series!!
It was my all time favorite movie.
It is so nice to watch. I taped off TV when it aired. and my copy is terrible.
Please someone, make a DVD of this wonder show !

This is a great movie full of fun. Also shows different events through the years and the songs are unique and catchy. Sure wish this movie/mini series would come out on DVD so that everyone would have a chance to own and watch it over and over.
this is a great movie I have been looking for this movie for years, full of catchy 50's music. i just cant say enough good things about this tv mini series
